title: Officers investigating North Charleston nightclub shooting
content:
Please install the latest Adobe Flash Player Plugin to watch this content.
NORTH CHARLESTON, S.C. (WCBD) — The Dorchester County Sheriff’s Office is investigating following a shooting at Club Brandy on Saturday, July 23.
Authorities say the incident happened in the parking lot of the Ashley Phosphate club following a fight inside.
We’re told of the four people shot, two of them had serious injuries. All of the victims are expected to survive.
If you have any information, contact your local law enforcement division or Crime Stoppers at 843-554-1111.
Keep checking counton2.com for real-time updates on this story. To get breaking news alerts, download the free News 2 App for iPhone or Android. You can also sign up for email alerts.
